UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activity of Snake B-Defensins and Derived Peptides
Literature.Author: Oguiura N, Corrêa PG, Rosmino IL, de Souza AO, Pasqualoto KFM

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=26.6µM),Micrococcus luteus A270(MIC=1.7µM),Citrobacter freundii(MIC=26.7µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>105µM),Providencia rettgeri(no activity data),Serratia marcescens(no activity data),Morganella morganii(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae(no activity data)
